text: Brian D. Beaudreault (born 1960) is a lieutenant general in the United States Marine Corps, who serves as commander of II Marine Expeditionary Force. He previously served as the Deputy Commandant for Plans, Policies, and Operations. He was commissioned in 1983, after graduating from the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. ==References== Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:University of Massachusetts Amherst alumni Category:United States Marine Corps generals
title: Brian Beaudreault
